pauseButton - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Button which can be clicked on to pause the game
pauseColour - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameTimer
Holds the colour that the timer's label assumes while it's stalled
pauseGame() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Pauses the game and opens the pause-menu (which is just a sub-stage in the GameScreen class) Specifically pauses the game's timer and marks the engine's internal play-state to [State.PAUSE]
pauseStage - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Establishes a secondary stage which will appear when the game is paused
phase - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Holds the number of the phase that the game is currently in Varies between 1 and 5
phase() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Return's the game's phase as a number between (or possibly one of) 1 and 5
phaseLabel - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Label identifying the current phase number
Player - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
Player(Integer) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.Player
The constructor of the class
playerID - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Player
Unique numerical identifier of the player.
players - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Stores data pertaining to the game's active players For more information, check the "Player" class
players() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Returns all of the data pertaining to the array of players managed by the game's engine Unless the game's architecture changes radically, this should only ever return two Player objects

possibleUpgrades() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Roboticon
A method to return an array of all possible upgrades available to the roboticon at its current state
Produce(Player) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Tile
Calculates how many resources are produced based on the amount of roboticons present and adds them to the player.
productionModifier() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Roboticon
A method to return the production modifier offered by the roboticon.
